title: Contacting Spirits - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/19/22
itunes:title: Contacting Spirits - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/19/22
description:
George Noory and psychic mediums Scott Degenhardt and Leisa Williams explore their work communicating with spirits on the other side, how they have recorded the voices of spirits no longer in this world, and discuss what happens to us after we die.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
